title: Armbian 23.11 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS and Support for New Devices
description:
Armbian 23.11 distribution for embedded devices is now available with support for Linux kernel 6.6 LTS, support for new devices, daily builds based on Ubuntu 23.10 and Debian 13 and more.

The post Armbian 23.11 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS and Support for New Devices appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: 4MLinux 44 Adds System-Wide VA-API Support, Improves Printing Support
description:
4MLinux 44 distribution is now available for download with VA-API support, improved support for SPL printing and wireless networking, as well as updated components and support for new apps.

The post 4MLinux 44 Adds System-Wide VA-API Support, Improves Printing Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Mesa 23.3 Linux Graphics Stack Brings the NVK Vulkan Driver for NVIDIA Hardware
description:
Mesa 23.3 open-source graphics stack is now available for download with the NVK Vulkan driver for NVIDIA hardware, Asahi driver improvements, fixes for many games, and more.

The post Mesa 23.3 Linux Graphics Stack Brings the NVK Vulkan Driver for NVIDIA Hardware appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: KDE Plasma 6 Desktop Environment Is Now Available for Public Beta Testing
description:
KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment is now available for public beta testing. The first beta release is available for download with more bug fixes and various improvements.

The post KDE Plasma 6 Desktop Environment Is Now Available for Public Beta Testing appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Cinnamon 6.0 Desktop Environment Arrives with Initial Wayland Support
description:
Cinnamon 6.0 desktop environment is now available with an experimental Wayland session, support for AVIF images, an improved Sound applet, as well as various other changes.

The post Cinnamon 6.0 Desktop Environment Arrives with Initial Wayland Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
